mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and using responsive design techniques to improve mobile performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Compress large images and use lazy loading to speed up the website.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more high-quality, relevant content and optimize meta tags for better search engine ranking.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by simplifying the menu and adding a clearer call-to-action button.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by minimizing the number of steps and providing a progress bar.
tips: Ensure fast loading times by optimizing resources and minimizing scripts.
Enhance mobile responsiveness with a mobile-first approach.
